biotools.summary: IBRENA (Insilico Biochemical REaction Network Analysis) is a software to aid the analysis of complex biological reaction networks. In order to reduce computation time, in some cases, ordinary differential equations (ODEs) are solved using Visual FORTRAN (HP-Compaq V6.6, Palo Alto, CA) with integrated IMSL library (Visual Numerics Inc., Houston, TX). This reduces the computational time required for time-consuming sensitivity analysis.
